recipe.title: Gin, Tea, and Lemon Fizz
ingredients: 4 teaspoons black tea leaves or 4 tea bags (such as Darjeeling)
instructions: In small saucepan, bring 1 cup water to boil. Add tea leaves. Remove from heat. Cover and let steep 15 minutes. Chill overnight. Strain tea mixture into pitcher; discard tea leaves. Add lemonade concentrate and gin, then sparkling water to pitcher; stir to blend. Serve over ice.
